reviews.review: I stopped gaming in 04.  HL1 ruined me for other games. Nothing could compare so I stopped. Boy, did I miss a lot. What can I say... game play, story and of course Alyx. I had seen a play through on ytube. I was thinking, this kinda look familiar. I had seen pictures back in the day when HL2 was just a rumor. Been playing it and mods for over a year now. I've even been making mods myself. In a word, great.
better than first in my opinion.

good game
but not as good as black messa
An iconic classic of PC gaming. Worth many many replays even after all these years. Best storytelling and atmosphere.

Nostalgia 100%. One of the most iconic games in the whole history of videogame industry, with impressive 55 Goty awards. Haven't finished it yet, but so far it looks very interesting for a game that was made 17 years ago. Good job, Valve! Waiting for Half-Life 3 :DD
it is  really fun great story log and wepons
The sad story of the theoretical physicist Freeman which will never know the end of his story. and we may never see EP3.
Este juego es mejor que Dark Souls
First few minutes were good until it got hard, but it was a great challenge!
Greatest Video Game of All Time... nuff said

I played this when it came out a couple of times through, long before Steam even existed.

As you can see, I have it here on my new laptop's SSD and have only loaded it to see what Valve have done with it recently (answer:something to do with FOV, I think?). Nor have I played it since (checks) 2014, which I'm guessing I must have done briefly to 'celebrate' it's TENTH FUCKING ANNIVERSARY.

NEVER FORGET, VALVE! NEVER FORGET WHAT YOU WERE! NEVER FORGET HOW YOU MADE YOURSELVES A SUCCESS BY ROPING IN MILLIONS OF PEOPLE WITH ONE OF THE BEST GAMES EVER THEN LEAVE IT ON A CLIFFHANGER! NEVER FORGET HOW YOU BROUGHT IT BACK FOR A GOD-DAMN VR... *splutters*... PREQUEL! 

WE WON'T, VALVE! WE REMEMBER! THE NORTH REMEMBERS! Wait... that's not right... ANYWAY, WE AAAAAALLLLLL REMEMBER! 17 YEARS! 17 LOOOOOONNNNG YEARS! 

WHAT ABOUT GORDON, VALVE? WHAT ABOUT ALYX? WHAT ABOUT EVERYONE?

WHAT ABOUT EARTH????

YOU B*STARDS!

WHAT

ABOUT 

EARTH?????

Anyway, 10/10, literally a masterpiece and a seminal title in the evolution of PC gaming. Do not recommend.
Un Juego Revolucionario y con un legado inolvidable 20/10

I remember playing this game as a teen with my friend at his house as he had a better computer at the time.  This was back when AOL was still everyone's internet provider.

Man, I feel old now. 

I'm playing this with a 3070 and it's complete overkill because of the age of this game.  It's great to see as well that the compatibility for it running on Windows 10 is amazing.  There are no running issues whatsoever.  

If you have never played this game before then I'd say you are in for a treat and definitely buy it as the Orange Box bundle as it's so cheap and you get the other games that go with it too.

The Industrial Revolution and its consequences have
been a disaster for the human race. They have greatly
increased the life-expectancy of those of us who live in
‚Äúadvanced‚Äù countries, but they have destabilized society,
have made life unfulfilling, have subjected human beings

have inflicted severe damage on the natural world.

yet another pivotal fps. half life 2 starts and ends really strong, with some really strong moments throughout. 
in between those moments though, its kinda boring, and even frustrating at times. 
enemies arent hitscan, but i dont see the point of making them projectile, since its completely impossible to avoid taking fire when in the open. this is very much a cover shooter. 
the weapons are cool, albeit kinda generic with the exception of the gravity gun. 
the visuals and the overall atmosphere is amazing, it has that ethereal, overcast, source feel to it. youve seen the twitter accounts. source games just have this... feel to them. you know it. this game does not disappoint in that aspect.
its a awesome game being released in 2004, i recommend it alot. you should play it definitely
I hated the story, Australium doesn't even make sense. Better luck next time valve.

half-life, and all of its other games, are genius in so many ways. I will never forget the impact half-life has had on my life so far.
